text.text_translated:
"Dangerous asteroids" are rocks.
They pass closer than 7.5 million kilometres to Earth's orbit.
NASA has a map of 1,400 of these dangerous asteroids.
NASA thinks none of them will be a danger for the next 100 years.
NASA has technology.
It is available now.
NASA can track these objects.
They can say when an asteroid might hit.
Two ways to stop them can be launched.
